## Objective 2
Objective of this presentation is to analyze the The data was extracted from the 1974
_Motor Trend_ US magazine, and comprises fuel consumption and 10 aspects of automobile design
and performance for 32 automobiles (1973-74 models). Following are the analysis activities

* Exploratory Analysis
* Fit a Liner model to estimate the miles/(US) gallon
* Conclusion
